content: bamboo forest designed by adrienne fong shown in regia extra twist merino 210 m/50 gm this unisex pattern which is manly enough for the guys in your life yet fun for the gals reminded me of a grove of bamboo the bamboo is the symbol for longevity in the chinese culture i so wanted to add live long and prosper but i won t lol bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry bamboo forest designed by adrienne fong this unisex pattern which is manly enough for the guys in your life yet fun for the gals reminded me of a grove of bamboo the bamboo is the symbol for longevity in the chinese culture i so wanted to add live long and prosper but i won t lol gauge 8 5 sts & 12 row/inch in stockinette using 2 5mm needles finished size for large 8 inch leg circumference blocked and relaxed 8 inch foot circumference blocked and relaxed 6 1/4 inch leg length notes when more than one number is given the first applies to the small size the second to the medium and the third to the large the size of the sock can be adjusted by using a smaller or larger needle for a different gauge abbreviations eor- end of round/row 2/2l c2 over 2 left - slip 2 sts onto cable needle hold in front knit 2 sts knit 2 sts from cable needle 2/2r c2 over 2 right - slip 2 sts onto cable needle hold in back knit 2 sts knit 2 sts from cable needle sl- slip as if to purl unless otherwise noted shown in regia extra twist merino 210m/50gm k2tog/p2tog- knit/purl 2 stitches together ssk- slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if size adult small med large 7 8 9 ankle to purl insert left needle through the front loops of the two slipped stitches and knit them together materials pm- place marker 100 gm light fingering wt sock yarn work group of stitches between brackets for us size 1 2 25mm or size needed to obtain specified number of times gauge us size 1 5 needles 2 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge stitch markers cable needle tapestry needle bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry instructions established pick up and knit same number of stitches along remaining side of heel pm to indicate end of instep knit 9 10 11 stitches and place cuff using 2 25mm needles loosely cast on 64 marker the beginning of the round is now the 70 80 stitches join being careful not to twist middle of the heel your stitches place marker to indicate beginning
